title: AP Exam
body: The columns in Table $$11.37$$ contain the $$\frac{Race}{Ethnicity}$$ of U.S. Public Schools for a recent year, the percentages for the Advanced Placement Examinee Population for that class, and the Overall Student Population. Suppose the right column contains the result of a survey of 1,000 local students from that year who took an AP Exam.
